name: Liquid Force Peak 6X Wakeboard Bindings
short_description: Dual lace closure helps you dial in the perfect fit
Soft to mid-flex pattern is soft and supportive to help through landings
6X chassis system is the foundation for lightweight, comfortable, responsive bindings
Honeycomb Flex Floor and TPE impact-dampening base add shocks to your ride
product_description: Similar to its 4D counterpart, the Liquid Force Peak 6X is equipped with exceptional features that make the Peak 6X a workhorse for not only Nico, but many LF Team Riders. This do-it-all binding features Reflex walk liners for navigating your way back to the starting dock at the park and a dual lace closure to help you dial in your perfect fit. With a soft to mid-flex pattern, the Peak is soft enough for tweaks but supportive enough to be there to help you through landings off kickers or anything into the flats.The Liquid Force 6X Chassis system is a state of the art 6" wide mounting platform. This chassis is the foundation for lightweight, comfortable, and responsive bindings for boat and cable riders alike.Honeycomb Flex Floor and TPE Impact-Dampening Base keep things smooth underfoot and add shock absorbers to your ride. The Honeycomb floor also doubles as full-length chassis water drainage system.Comfort and performance meet in perfection with the Reflex Performance Liner and TPE Impact-Dampening Base. The Reflex liner offers plenty of support and comfort while still being able to fill your desire to tweak.Universally compatible with 6" inserts and LF FlexTrack Wakeboards.. 6X Chassis System. Medium-to-wide fit. Soft-to-medium flex. Upper speed hook lacing / dual-zone lacing with hex locks. Ankle lace loop heel-hold system. Walk-out reflex liner with all-terrain outsole. Dual-zone elastic. Rubber traction pods provide extra grip and durability. Honeycomb flex floor and drainage system. TPE impact-dampening base. Sustainable assembly with glue-less locking frame

name: 2024 Hyperlite M60 Wakeboard Bindings 11 UK
short_description: Upper Material: synthetic
Closure: molded lace guides, reinforced laces, POM lace locks
Liner: Pro

Flex: Max Support Level, Mid Range of Motion
product_description: Boom goes the dynamite, Hyperlite's bomb-proof M60 Binding explodes into the line. The M60 features our new bomb-proof construction from the Fusion Plate System up, including new Abrasion Resistant Materials, Reinforced Toe-Box and a brand-new Heavy Duty Lace System. The M60 laces incorporate nylon lace guides, high tensile strength laces, and polyoxymethylene lace locks. Combined with our 3D Heat Moldable Liner & cushy insoles the M60 is comfort and durability combined in one awesome wakeboard binding.

name: CTRL Imperial V2 Open-Toe Wakeboard Bindings
short_description: J-Bars keep your feet locked in place
3-strap, hook-and-loop closure system makes it easy to get in and out
Comfortable EVA footbed keeps feet protected through each landing
Ergonomically designed to eliminate pinch points
product_description: CTRL Imperial V2 Open-Toe Wakeboard Bindings are great for a variety of foot sizes so that you and your friends can take turns tearing it up. Featuring J-Bars and a 3-strap hook-and-loop closure system, these bindings are easy to get in and out of while keeping your feet locked in place during intense activity. Your feet will also stay comfortable with the EVA footbed that keeps them protected through each landing.. Adjustable 3-strap hook-and-loop closure for easy in and out. Ergonomically designed to eliminate pinch points. Comfortable EVA footbed. Micro adjust baseplate. Open-toe design to fit a range of foot sizes. J-Bars for lockdown heel hold. Men's sizes: M(7-9), L(9-12)

name: Airhead Venom II Wakeboard Binding, Multiple Sizes, Open Toe Design, Multiple Binding Angles
short_description: Open Toe Design: Versatile open toe design accommodates a wide range of foot sizes for a comfortable fit.
Lightweight Chassis: The lightweight chassis ensures a snug fit for most feet, providing excellent comfort and support.
Adjustable Lacing System: Features an easy-to-use adjustable lacing system for a customized, secure fit every time.
Multiple Binding Angles: Offers multiple binding angles to help you find the most comfortable foot position while riding.
Versatile & Comfortable: Perfect for riders of all levels, providing flexibility and comfort for an enhanced water sport experience.
product_description: Venom is an open toe wakeboard boot designed to fit a wide range of sizes. It has left and right specific plates for a better fit, and opens wide for quick, easy entry. The lightweight chassis of these wakeboard bindings fits most feet. The flexible plastisol overlay and easy adjust lace system provide the fit and support you demand. You’ll never lose your mounting hardware again with Venom’s adaptive thumbscrew system. AHB-21 fits youth shoe size 4 – 8 and Women’s shoe size 6 – 10, and AHB-22 fits US men’s shoe size 9 – 12.

product_description: The Liquid Force Index Wakeboard Binding is a great binding for all skill levels and also an excellent choice for riders who are just starting out. It features the brand new 6R chassis, comfort liner, impact EVA footbed, and a dampening mid-sole for maximum comfort felt throughout the binding. Dual laces help you customize the fit to your specific foot, and the size range accommodates everyone on board.. Soft flex profile. Accommodating elastic fit. Top-cuff stretch zone. Dual-zone lacing with hex locks. 6R chassis system. Impact EVA ergonomic contoured footbed with 2.5° cant. Comfort integrated EVA liner. Compatible with wakeboards with 6" inserts or the Liquid Force Flextrack System. One Size Fits Most: US Mens 8-12.

name: Hyperlite Viva Wakeboard Binding
short_description: Range of Motion – Max
Support Feel – Mid
Low Pro Plate System

product_description: Ladies rejoice with the Viva and the customizable feel and support it delivers. Thanks to the quick cinch lace zone and the upper ankle Velcro Closure, you can dial this binding in to meet your needs while shredding the wake. Affix the Viva on any wakeboard with our 6in Universal Mounting System and feel free to share the binding with your friends as the open toe design accommodates multiple size feet. CONSTRUCTION FEATURES Support Level - Mid, Range of Motion - Max, Low Pro Plate System, Adjustable Sizing, Easy On Fit, Articulating Cuff, Aluminum Mounting System, 6” Universal Mounting Spread, Molded EVA Footbed, Lace Closure - Lower, Velcro Closure - Ankle

name: Hyperlite Agent Wakeboard Bindings Fit Wakeboard Boot Sizes 8-14
product_description: From the bottom up the Agent is an all over killer, starting with Low Pro Plate System. This minimizes material and flex between your foot and the board for better control and response. Moving up the binding line to a super kush rear flex zone that makes entry and exiting the binding easier than ever! An all new EVA padded footbed provides maximum comfort and padding under the toe and heel without sacrificing response time or weight. For added durability we added metal inserts in the mounting bracket to allow for better hold when mounting the binding and reducing wear. If you're looking to step up your game this year, the Agent binding is your binding! These are designed as an OSFM model (one size fits most) but the core range is 8-14.

name: Hyperlite Frequency Boot OSFA (20394005)
short_description: ENHANCED DURABILITY - Features high-quality nylon and EVA foam binding materials, ensuring long-lasting performance and resistance to wear and tear for seasons of reliable use.
SUPERIOR PERFORMANCE - Designed with a Quick Cinch Center Lace Zone, providing a secure and customizable fit for optimal control and responsiveness on the water.
MAXIMUM STABILITY - Incorporates a Low Pro Plate System with Claw Mount, offering a stable and direct connection to the board for enhanced balance and control during rides.
VERSATILE FIT - The OSFA (One Size Fits All) design accommodates Men's sizes 6-12, making it easy to share among friends and family, reducing the need for multiple sizes.
LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN - Constructed with lightweight EVA foam, these bindings minimize added weight, allowing for greater agility and reduced fatigue during extended sessions.
